It is really a prototype, Steve. I am trying to test the learning 
algorith=
m on it. You see that the legs, arms and the torso are 
cubic.. eh.. what w=
as that word.. they have edges! It gives more 
problems. The guys at Natura=
lMotion have their own models, taken from 
biometric data.. And more, they =
have modeled elastic muscles and so 
on... It's just a prototype to test Hy=
perNEAT. I see that NEAT and 
HyperNEAT are the best EC learning algorithms=
 available, so thank Ken 
for creating it and... and I will now try to make=
 more accurate 
models and run it. These current models.. just suck! 

Pete=
r
